Grasp target objects

Contents

  • geometry.base_geometry
  • geometry.cube

Grasp target objects#

Target objects from the environments are part of the grasp constraints. The geometry module defines optim.geometry.base_geometry.Geometry as the common base class for all object interfaces. Its child classes read the information from the environment contact dictionary, initialize the object pose and enable the addition of object specific constraints to the optimization.

Note

At the moment, only the Cube geometry is implemented.

geometry.base_geometry#

Geometry base class module.

class optim.geometry.base_geometry.Geometry(info: Dict)#

Base class for all object geometries.

abstract create_surface_constraints(gripper: optim.grippers.base_gripper.Gripper, opt: optim.core.optimizer.Optimizer)#

Create and register the constraints restricting contact points to the object surface.

Parameters

  • gripper – Gripper.

  • opt – Optimizer.

create_constraints(gripper: optim.grippers.base_gripper.Gripper, opt: optim.core.optimizer.Optimizer)#

Create and register all object constraints.

Parameters

  • gripper – Gripper.

  • opt – Optimizer.

geometry.cube#

Cube class module.

class optim.geometry.cube.Cube(info: Dict, gripper: optim.grippers.base_gripper.Gripper)#

Cube class to interface with the object information from the environment.

_contact_mapping(gripper: optim.grippers.base_gripper.Gripper) → Dict#

Map the contact points of the gripper to the closest plane of the cube.

Parameters

gripper – Gripper.

Returns

The contact mapping dictionary.

create_surface_constraints(gripper: optim.grippers.base_gripper.Gripper, opt: optim.core.optimizer.Optimizer)#

Create constraints to keep contact points on the surface of the cube.

Constraints are registered with the optimizer. Uses the gripper kinematics to calculate the current position of the contact point.

Parameters

  • gripper – Gripper.

  • opt – Optimizer.
